entry.title: What CSS Do You Absolutely Have to Know in 2022?
entry.summary: Sacha Greif openly wondered whether CSS has gotten to be, you know, too big. With all the goodies thatâ€™ve shipped in browsers the past couple of years â€” container queries! relative color syntax! cascade layers! logical propertiesâ€¦ What CSS Do You Absolutely Have to Know in 2022? originally published on CSS-Tricks, which is part of the DigitalOcean family. entry.title: Managing CSS Styles in a WordPress Block Theme
entry.summary: The way we write CSS for WordPress themes is in the midst of sweeping changes. I recently shared a technique for adding fluid type support in WordPress by way of theme.json, a new file that WordPress has been pushing â€¦ Managing CSS Styles in a WordPress Block Theme originally published on CSS-Tricks, which is part of the DigitalOcean family. You should get the newsletter.
